alert.note: Alert for Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:34PM CDT until September 25 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 434 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Queen City, or 7 miles north of Atlanta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Atlanta, Queen City, Bivins, Ravanna, Brightstar, Bloomburg and Domino. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
